archimate:Requirement.name: SY.1.2.8b: b) details of internet-facing web servers are recorded in a register (or equivalent), which includes details about hosting location, IP address(es), domain name(s) and digital certificates used
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
